message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm asking for $18,000. I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I believe I can't justify spending $18,000 on it. Would you consider lowering the price to $15,000?

Hi Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I appreciate your understanding of the product's value. While $18,000 represents my ideal price, I'm willing to come down to $16,500. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise for both of us.

Thank you for adjusting your price, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $15,000. I hope this aligns better with what you're looking for.

Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but $15,000 is simply too low for me to consider. I'm willing to make one final concession to close this deal.  Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $15,750?
I understand your position, Alice. I've done some research and feel comfortable offering $15,500 for the product. This feels like a fair compromise considering its value and my budget.
